summary:
This Mod will add a Female companion who has a ablity to transform into dragon while
player is in combat.She will immediately turned into dragon whenever player enters in
combat and turns into human when the combat ends.
descriptionHtml:
[b]
The Lady Of Akatosh
[/b]

=========================================================================================

Your Efforts to save the skyrim from the evil dragons is noticed by the chief
deity of nines Akotosh the dragon god and blessed You with his favorite priestess
Known as Lady Of Akotosh to aid in your difficulties and fight against your foes.To resist
the dead thats eagerly waiting for hugging to you while fighting against
deadly monsters.
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18762-1-1339678640.jpg[/img]



=========================================================================================
Description
===============================================================================================
This Mod will add a Female companion who has a ability to transform into dragon while
player is in combat.She will immediately turned into dragon whenever player enters in
combat and turns into human when the combat ends.


You can found her near the woodmill in riverwod village

She will become dragon only at exterior cells.


While in interior she will fight in human form.In human form she used her deadly spells
along with dragon shout.

You can Now choose what type of dragon she will become.Currently only four races added.

You can also choose the size of dragon she will become.Normal,Huge and small.

Now she only automatically transform into dragon against giants and dragons.

You can now manually select her transformation through a newly added devi dragonTransformation
spell under conjuration section.

To choose the race and size of dragon cast options Spell under Conjuration section.

As a priestess of Akatosh she has a ability to cure your diseases.

She can wear anything you put in her inventory

she is leveled with player in human form and slightly powerful in dragon form.

She is fully compatible with any other followers enhanced mods.


=========================================================================================
Change log
=========================================================================================
Updated to version 0.5

Two new spells added under conjuration section 

Options spell to choose the race and size of dragon.

Devi DragonTransformationspell to control the transformation to dragon

Removed glowing effect when she returns into human form

=========================================================================================
Bugs Report
=========================================================================================
She is still in early stages so there may be some bugs

I have checked several time and haven\'t got any black face bug if anybody does not my fault.

for other bugs report leave a comment

=========================================================================================

If you like this mod please endorsed.

=========================================================================================

Thank You

=========================================================================================

[Youtube]oL4-4A_7c6s[/Youtube]
author: Praveen
